REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes certain criteria for the rent guidelines board to use for purposes of determining annual rent adjustments
Summary: Establishes certain criteria for the rent guidelines board to use for purposes of determining annual rent adjustments.
LawCode: Amd ยง26-510, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing certain criteria for the rent guidelines board to use for purposes of determining annual rent adjustments
